page.title: 02SPORT AND RECREATION
page.content: SPORT AND RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES IN BRADWELL ------------------------ Many years ago Bradwell had a bowling green at the side of the Bath Hotel (now called the Thatchers Inn). Some time later this closed down, and the land was bought for building purposes. In 1984 Mr.C.Bland decided to form a new committee to build a new bowling green. Bradwell Sports Club bought a field opposite the Thatchers Inn for a football pitch and allowed the bowling green committee and other volunteers to build the green. They started building this in 1984 and finished in 1985. It is hoped that the green will feel its first bowl this year.
